Recent Projects

I'm currently in the process of syncing my personal projects to this page. You can find a complete list of my personal projects here:

briancaffey.com/projects

  • Full Stack web appliction with Django, VueJS, Docker, and other containerized services

    This project takes you through the process of setting up, developing, deploying and maintaining a modern web application built with Django, VueJS, nginx and other services in docker containers.

    The project focuses on:

    • Local development environment setup with docker-compose
    • Git workflow
    • CI/CD with GitLab
    • Deploying on DigitalOcean

    briancaffey/verbose-equals-true

    https://verbose-equals-true.tk

  • Using Leaflet to display geographical data in a Django app with Mapbox, DataTables, Bootstrap 4 and Travis CI

    This project shows how to use Leaflet maps in a Django project. You can a technical description of this project here.


    briancaffey/django-leaflet-demo

    http://159.89.235.193/books/

  • AUR and Official Arch Linux Repository Data Analysis

    This project explores data I collected from archlinux.org.


    briancaffey/AUR-data

    http://briancaffey.github.io/2017/12/02/arch-linux-package-data-analysis.html

  • PC PartPicker data analysis

    I collected data from PCPartPicker.com to build data visualizations and price models using machine learning techniques.


    briancaffey/pcpartpicker-data

    http://briancaffey.github.io/2017/01/01/pc-data.html

  • playquest.io

    I built an in-browser game platform for creating and sharing games and stories based on Unicode emoji.


    briancaffey/playquest

    http://playquest.io

  • six degrees of subreddits

    This is a tool to find the shortest path between any two subreddits based links referrenced in the “related subreddits” of each subreddit page.


    briancaffey/briancaffey.com/tree/master/srgraph

    http://briancaffey.com/six-degrees-of-subreddits

  • bucksamonth.com

    A social app to track your monthly paid subscriptions.


    briancaffey/bucksamonth

    http://www.bucksamonth.com
